summary: A General, who had sent for a cadet from the Kremlin Guard to work as his personal driver, decided to marry him to his physically disabled daughter
cast: Igor Petrenko|Elena Babenko|Bogdan Stupka|Andrey Panin|Ekaterina Yudina|Marina Golub|Valeriy Barinov|Natalya Gudkova|Alisa Grebenshchikova|Dmitriy Vysotskiy|Aleksey Zelensky|Aleksandr Mezentsev|Vladimir Koval|Sergey Udovik|Aleksandr Shavrin|Oleg Lopukhov|Aleksandr Fastovskiy|Aleksandr Dedyushko|Galina Petrova
title: Voditel dlya Very
